CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: A novel series of low band gap donor - acceptor copolymers derived from 4,5bis(2-ethylhexyloxy)-benzo[2,1-b:3,4-b′]dithiophene ( BDT ) and 5,6-difluoro-4,7-bis(4-alkylthien-2-yl)benzo [c][1,2,5]thiadiazole bearing various alkyl side chains , such as PffBB-n ( n = 10 , 12 , 14 , and 16 ) , were developed for high - performance bulk - heterojunction ( BHJ ) polymer solar cells ( PSCs ).

Let's think step by step.

1. 4,5bis(2-ethylhexyloxy)-benzo[2,1-b:3,4-b′]dithiophene (BDT)
2. 5,6-difluoro-4,7-bis(4-alkylthien-2-yl)benzo[c][1,2,5]thiadiazole (PffBB)
3. PffBB-n (n = 10, 12, 14, and 16)

These entities are identified as "Material Name" as they represent specific types or variations of materials used in the development of the high-performance bulk-heterojunction polymer solar cells.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. BDT (4,5bis(2-ethylhexyloxy)-benzo[2,1-b:3,4-b′]dithiophene)
2. PffBB (5,6-difluoro-4,7-bis(4-alkylthien-2-yl)benzo[c][1,2,5]thiadiazole)
3. PffBB-n (n = 10, 12, 14, and 16)

These entities are the only ones that can be clearly identified as specific materials mentioned in the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| BDT (4,5bis(2-ethylhexyloxy)-benzo[2,1-b:3,4-b′]dithiophene) |
| PffBB (5,6-difluoro-4,7-bis(4-alkylthien-2-yl)benzo[c][1,2,5]thiadiazole) |
| PffBB-n (n = 10, 12, 14, and 16) |

2. 5,6-difluoro-4,7-bis(4-alkylthien-2-yl)benzo[c][1,2,5]thiadiazole
